translations: 提高……的等级或价值；改进性能；升级（uprate 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The uprating will as usual be based on inflation in the year to the preceding September.
sentences.translation: 同以往一样，增长仍然基于九月之前的通胀数据。

sentences.sentence: Shafting abnormal vibration fault usually arises after the uprating on turbo-generator unit.
sentences.translation: 机组增容改造后易发生轴系异常振动。

sentences.sentence: This effect will not be universal, since many schemes specify the RPI as the index to use when uprating pensions.
sentences.translation: 这个影响会是普遍的，因为许多方案把零售物价指数(RPI)指定为提高养老金的参考指数。
